abstract.t: VPNs are a common service being offered by providers. The PPVPN WGis tasked with defining a limited number of solutions to support theinteroperable deployment of VPN services. As part of this effort, adesign team was tasked with defining the requirements of PPVPNdiscovery proposals, to analyze if additional discovery schemes areneeded, and to characterize potential solutions to the problem. This draft is the output of that design work. Consensus was notreached on the solution characteristics. However, this draftattempts to capture the discussions and positions of the design teamexchanges.
